title: 465. Try Straight Lines + Stitch in the Ditch
description:
On today's show, we're talking about tips for straight-line quilting and stitch-in-the-ditch! It's a great time to finish some quilts and you can get really amazing results with these two simple techniques. We're also sharing how to help health care professionals by sewing masks. And then we also do a wrap-up of trends we saw at Quilt Con last month. We end the episode with a Q&A with Meg Dunton of Monograms for Makers.

For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: Try Straight Lines + Stitch in the Ditch
itunes:author: American Patchwork & Quilting
itunes:subtitle: Learn two easy techniques for quilting machine-quilting your projects on your domestic machine.
